about.description:
A high level, "more Pythonic" interface to the PKCS#11 (Cryptoki) standard to support
HSM and Smartcard devices in Python.
The interface is designed to follow the logical structure of a HSM, with useful
defaults for obscurely documented parameters. Many APIs will optionally accept
iterables and act as generators, allowing you to stream large data blocks for
symmetric encryption.
about.summary: A high level Python interface to the PKCS#11 (Cryptoki) standard to support HSM and Smartcard devices

name: python-pkcs11
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "python-pkcs11" %}
{% set version = "0.5.0" %}
{% set sha256 = "154150ce529ed0f8a7ed7d7ffe3a5be0211427c3ecb8e135fa12042fb3a66790" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 2
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
  skip: True  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
  host:
    - cython
    - setuptools
    - setuptools_scm
  run:
    - cython
    - aenum 2.0.*  # [py2k or py35]
    - asn1crypto ==0.22.0
    - cached-property 1.3.*

test:
  imports:
    - pkcs11
    - pkcs11.constants
    - pkcs11.mechanisms
    - pkcs11.exceptions
    - pkcs11.util
    - pkcs11.util.rsa
    - pkcs11.util.dsa
    - pkcs11.util.dh
    - pkcs11.util.ec
    - pkcs11.util.x509


about:
  home: http://python-pkcs11.readthedocs.io/
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  summary: 'A high level Python interface to the PKCS#11 (Cryptoki) standard to support HSM and Smartcard devices'

  description: |
      A high level, "more Pythonic" interface to the PKCS#11 (Cryptoki) standard to support
      HSM and Smartcard devices in Python.
      The interface is designed to follow the logical structure of a HSM, with useful
      defaults for obscurely documented parameters. Many APIs will optionally accept
      iterables and act as generators, allowing you to stream large data blocks for
      symmetric encryption.
  doc_url: http://python-pkcs11.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
  dev_url: https://github.com/danni/python-pkcs11

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - sodre
